videoTitle.title: Video Title
videoTitle.description: The title of the YouTube video.

link.title: Video Link
link.description: The URL link to the YouTube video.

duration.title: Video Duration
duration.description: The duration of the YouTube video.

videoDescription.title: Video Description
videoDescription.description: A detailed description of the YouTube video.

publishedAt.title: Publish Date
publishedAt.description: The date and time when the video was published.

position.title: Position in Playlist
position.description: The video's position in the playlist.

likes.title: Like Count
likes.description: The number of likes on the video.

views.title: View Count
views.description: The number of views on the video.

comments.title: Comment Count
comments.description: The number of comments on the video.

thumbnails.title: Thumbnails
thumbnails.description: Various resolution thumbnails for the video.

default.title: Default Thumbnail
default.description: URL for the default thumbnail image.

medium.title: Medium Thumbnail
medium.description: URL for the medium-sized thumbnail image.

high.title: High Thumbnail
high.description: URL for the high-resolution thumbnail image.

standard.title: Standard Thumbnail
standard.description: URL for the standard thumbnail image.

maxres.title: Max Resolution Thumbnail
maxres.description: URL for the maximum resolution thumbnail image.

videoOwnerChannelTitle.title: Channel Title
videoOwnerChannelTitle.description: The title of the channel that owns the video.

videoOwnerChannelId.title: Channel ID
videoOwnerChannelId.description: The ID of the channel that owns the video.
